GSSP Location: candidates are in southern Urals or Nashui (south China).
Correlation Events: Conodont FADIdiognathodus simulator (s.str.). Close to FAD of ammonoid Shumardites.

GSSP Location: candidates are in southern Urals, southwest USA and Nashui (south China).
Correlation Events:
Fusulinid FAD Protriticites, which is near ammonoid FAD Eothalossoceras. Alternative (higher) base is fusulinid FAD Montiparus montiparus, which is near Conodont FADIdiognathodus
            sagittalis. Stage given here is the higher version; the lower one is about 1 myr older.
